parameters: 指定位置にアニメーション表示 408 312 22 ウェイトあり
\."That asshole...!! I knew somethin' was wrong
with it just ending like that!!"
\."Ahh... Gin...! We have to do something!"
\."Crap!! What now?! What should we do?!"
\."We can't jump down from this height...!"
\."Ain't there any way we can interfere?!"

\."Now I'm gonna make you admit that me,
right here... I'm the real Reko!!"
"No, you must have been apart for
at least as long as Alice has been in prison!"
\."That's plenty of time for a person's
\."And yet Alice keeps saying you're no different!
It's simply him who's convinced of that!!"
\."You got no proof, and ain't that rude?!
he could tell that by intuition!!"
\."Can you really deny all the years
of my life we've been together?!"
\.\C[4](Urk...! No way of refuting that one!)
\."You took most of the Clear Chips
we got in the Room of Lies, Reko!!"
share the Clear Chips with anyone else?!"
\."That greed... isn't like the real Reko!!"
'Cause we went in the Room of Lies together!!"
"No, there's a discrepancy between the wound
Reko got on her hand and your memory!"
\."That's exactly why even Keiji is adamant
"You talked with Professor Mishima at length...
And yet you're going to say you were sleepy?!"
\."Maybe the truth is we didn't talk that much, okay?!"
you were talking in great detail!!"
"Then the lack of wound on your hand is bizarre!!"
\."Nao saw her hand with large fragments stuck in it!!"
It's not noticeable, but it's there...!"
\."And Ranger was unable to clearly say
\."Shaking and vexed, he couldn't say it!!"
But he isn't saying you're real, either!"
\."Has he ever given us a hint
out of the kindness of his heart?!"
\."That damn Ranger wants us to be anxious,
doubt each other, and die!! Don't trust him!"
"Are you saying Ranger is intentionally being silent?!"
\."Yeah, exactly!! And you're being toyed with
if you can't see through that!"
\."Don't tell me, Sara, are YOU the actual fake here?!"
\.\C[4](This is just turning into a quarrel!)
we haven't met has replaced me as a faker..."
"No! Without there being someone we haven't met,
\."It's as simple as that! If the numbers don't line up,
that's 'cause there's no fake after all!"
that Ranger and Safalin can't lie!!"
There is one more person we don't see here!"
who called himself the Receptionist Doll!!"
That guy clearly ain't human, right?!"
and he's called the damn Receptionist Doll!!"
"If there are no new people... then maybe so!"
How would he become a fake me?!"
\."But if it were Kai... If the bleeding were stopped
and he was treated, he could be alive...!!"
\."Enough! It's useless to discuss this any more!"
\."But no matter how much we talk, you can't clearly
tell me who this fake or whatever really is!"
\."Come on... Say it already. Who am I?!"
\.\C[4](No humans we haven't met will appear...)
\.\C[3]The next one will be the last.
\."You don't... have to shoulder any more, Sara...!"
\."Was she... was she really, definitely a fake...?!"
\."Look at the corpse, you'll be able to tell!"
\."As if I could look... at the corpse...!!"
\.\C[3]I looked down at the fallen Reko.
\.\C[3]She looked nothing but real to me.
\.\C[3]Even if she was a doll... that was Reko.
\."...Look at that. She really was a doll."
\."But then... Where is the real Reko...?"
our Impression Room finally sank back to the ground.
\."Don't die, Gin!! Keiji's... bringin' an antidote!!
It might make the poison spread more...)
\.\C[4](All I can do is keep shouting...)
Gin will be fine with the antidote."
Reko... We're going to search for Reko!"
\."She's right... Keiji and me'll help Gin.
\C[10]Will you let Gin die and save the fake?
\.\C[4](Even knowing it's not the real Reko...)
